version_description: Fixed an issue that caused some paid users to be set back to trial mode. Fixed a few other minor issues.

Hi everyone. We've received a ton of great feedback from you these last few weeks -- thank you! It helps us make mSecure better. In this release we've squashed some of your most requested bugs.

- Fixed migration of photos and icons from version 4.

New:
- You can now email mSecure backups. Just go to Settings > Email Backup and tap "Continue". Backups are always encrypted with your password.
- Item titles now support multiple lines and have improved support for dynamic sized text (for those

- Adds syncing via iCloud, Dropbox and Wifi in addition to the new mSecure Cloud
- Adds custom icons
- Adds new mSecure online icons with 1000s to choose from
- Adds support for the iPhone X including Face ID
- Uses a new simplified purchase

- Fixed an issue where site icons aren't properly downloaded
- Fixed an issue with deleting a duplicated record
